title: testing: extra Indentation problem
body:
by **fisyonet**: 
testing.T.Error("my custom message") function adds extra tabs when it is
called multiple times in same test function. 

Screenshot is attached. 

On the other hand call to testing.T.ErrorF("my custom message") function does
not cause this problem.
Attachments: 1. Screen Shot 2013-03-30 at 9.14.53 PM 1.png (67982 bytes)
